propertyFields.name: username
propertyFields.description: Client id provided form Destination Service binding

propertyFields.name: password
propertyFields.description: Client secret provided from Destination Service binding

propertyFields.name: destinationUrl
propertyFields.description: Destination Service configuration URL provided from Destination Service binding

propertyFields.name: oAuthTokenUrl
propertyFields.description: OAuth URL to retrieve access token

methods.name: getAuthentication
methods.description: Get the authentication from the destination.
